DOC.brief_summary: The Culturally Relevant Exercise Diabetes ( CURE-D ) study determine whether culturally-sensitive dance intervention accept effective physical intervention South Asian woman type 2 diabetes mellitus . The CURE-D study determine Bollywood dance exercise improve diabetes outcome South Asian woman .
DOC.criteria: Sex : Females Ethnicity : South Asian Hemoglobin A1c ≥ 6.0 mg/dL A PAMF patient ≥ 24 month Able willing enroll meet requirement study . BMI > 35 Insulin dependent Current atrial fibrillation Active treatment cancer Diagnosis terminal illness and/or hospice care Any serious medical condition would prevent longterm participation would contraindicate physical activity Pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant study period Inability speak , read , understand English No long PAMF patient planning transfer care outside PAMF study period Investigator discretion clinical safety protocol adherence reason .
